ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He who created me and guides me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who created me and showed me the way,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Who created me and Who guides me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He created me and He will guide me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “The One Who created me, so He will guide me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who has created me, and it is He Who guides me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who created me, then He has shown me the way:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who created me, and Himself guides me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who created me, and He doth guide me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who created me. It is He who guides me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who hath created me, and He guideth me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who created me, it is He who guides me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Who created me, and it is He Who guides me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who has created me, and it is He Who guides me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who created me; and He guides me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He who created me, and guides me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who created me, and He [it is who] guides me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:78] [He] Who created me, it is He Who guides me, to [the proper] religion,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who created me) from a sperm drop, (and He doth guide me) He preserves me on the right religion and guides me to the Truth and guidance,
